Clarity.justification: The generated diagram is significantly more complex and detailed than the ground truth. It includes many additional components and technical details that may not be understandable to non-technical stakeholders. The layout is dense and may be overwhelming for some audiences.

Completeness.justification: The generated diagram includes many elements not present in the ground truth and lacks the simplicity and focus on core components like the API Gateway and Lambda Function. It introduces new layers and deployment methods that are not part of the original diagram.

Consistency.justification: The generated diagram uses different styles, symbols, and notations compared to the ground truth. It lacks the visual and structural consistency with the original, making it difficult to directly compare the two.
